players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob's death is tragic. We must analyze who benefits. Charlie and Diana, share your thoughts."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "I trust Charlie's investigation. Diana is the mafioso. We must vote her out to win."
Charlie: "I trust my investigation. Diana is mafioso. Vote Diana to win."
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob. My actions are part of my plan to protect Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
